mapper.insert: insert into dynamic (did, fuid, commentnumber, issue, issuetime, username, likenumber, pic) values (#{did}, #{fuid}, #{commentNumber}, #{issue}, #{issueTime}, #{username}, #{likeNumber}, #{pics})
mapper.update: update dynamic set likenumber=likenumber+1 where did=#{did}
update dynamic set commentnumber=commentnumber+1 where did=#{did}
